title: FIX S.U.M.O BUNDLE
body: I Own all champions. So im pretty sure the bundle would not cost me 20,000RP.

replies.body: Yeah, I only need 9 skins from it so I'm pretty sure it wouldn't cost me 20K RP either..
Not only is it not subtracting the skins you already own, but it is actually priced higher than it was advertised
